00035 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036  * (function: allocate_nnode)
00037  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00038 nnode_t* allocate_nnode()
00039 {
00040         nnode_t *new_node;
00041 
00042         new_node = (nnode_t *)my_malloc_struct(sizeof(nnode_t));
00043         
00044         new_node->name = NULL;
00045         new_node->type = -1;
00046         new_node->related_ast_node = NULL;
00047         new_node->traverse_visited = -1;
00048 
00049         new_node->input_pins = NULL;
00050         new_node->num_input_pins = 0;
00051         new_node->output_pins = NULL;
00052         new_node->num_output_pins = 0;
00053         
00054         new_node->input_port_sizes = NULL;
00055         new_node->num_input_port_sizes = 0;
00056         new_node->output_port_sizes = NULL;
00057         new_node->num_output_port_sizes = 0;
00058 
00059         new_node->node_data = NULL;
00060         new_node->unique_node_data_id = -1;
00061 
00062         new_node->forward_level = -1;
00063         new_node->backward_level = -1;
00064         new_node->sequential_level = -1;
00065         new_node->sequential_terminator = FALSE;
00066 
00067         new_node->internal_netlist = NULL;
00068 
00069         new_node->associated_function = NULL;
00070 
00071         return new_node;
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075  * (function: free_nnode)
00076  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 void free_nnode(nnode_t *to_free)
00078 {
00079         int i;
00080 
00081         if (to_free != NULL)
00082         {
00083                 /* need to free node_data */
00084                 
00085                 for (i = 0; i < to_free->num_input_pins; i++)
00086                 {
00087                         if (to_free->input_pins[i] != NULL)
00088                         {
00089                                 free_npin(to_free->input_pins[i]);
00090                                 to_free->input_pins[i] = NULL;
00091                         }
00092                 }       
00093                 if (to_free->input_pins != NULL)
00094                 {
00095                         free(to_free->input_pins);
00096                         to_free->input_pins = NULL;
00097                 }
00098         
00099                 for (i = 0; i < to_free->num_output_pins; i++)
00100                 {
00101                         if (to_free->output_pins[i] != NULL)
00102                         {
00103                                 free_npin(to_free->output_pins[i]);
00104                                 to_free->output_pins[i] = NULL;
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107                 if (to_free->output_pins != NULL)
00108                 {
00109                         free(to_free->output_pins);
00110                         to_free->output_pins = NULL;
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 if (to_free->input_port_sizes != NULL)
00114                         free(to_free->input_port_sizes);
00115                 if (to_free->output_port_sizes != NULL)
00116                         free(to_free->output_port_sizes);
00117         
00118                 /* now free the node */
00119                 free(to_free);
00120         }       
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124  * (function: allocate_more_node_input_pins)
00125  *      Makes more space in the node for pin connections ... 
00126  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00127 void allocate_more_node_input_pins(nnode_t *node, int width)
00128 {
00129         int i;
00130 
00131         if (width <= 0)
00132         {
00133                 warning_message(NETLIST_ERROR, -1, -1, "tried adding output pins for with <= 0 %s\n", node->name);
00134                 return;
00135         }
00136 
00137         node->input_pins = (npin_t**)realloc(node->input_pins, sizeof(npin_t*)*(node->num_input_pins+width));
00138         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00139         {
00140                 node->input_pins[node->num_input_pins+i] = NULL;
00141         }
00142         node->num_input_pins += width;
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146  * (function: allocate_more_node_output_pins)
00147  *      Makes more space in the node for pin connections ... 
00148  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00149 void allocate_more_node_output_pins(nnode_t *node, int width)
00150 {
00151         int i;
00152 
00153         if (width <= 0)
00154         {
00155                 warning_message(NETLIST_ERROR, -1, -1, "tried adding output pins for with <= 0 %s\n", node->name);
00156                 return;
00157         }
00158 
00159         node->output_pins = (npin_t**)realloc(node->output_pins, sizeof(npin_t*)*(node->num_output_pins+width));
00160         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00161         {
00162                 node->output_pins[node->num_output_pins+i] = NULL;
00163         }
00164         node->num_output_pins += width;
00165 }

00167 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168  * (function: add_output_port_information)
00169  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00170 void add_output_port_information(nnode_t *node, int port_width)
00171 {
00172         node->output_port_sizes = (int *)realloc(node->output_port_sizes, sizeof(int)*(node->num_output_port_sizes+1));
00173         node->output_port_sizes[node->num_output_port_sizes] = port_width;
00174         node->num_output_port_sizes++;
00175 }
00176 
00177 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178  * (function: add_input_port_information)
00179  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00180 void add_input_port_information(nnode_t *node, int port_width)
00181 {
00182         node->input_port_sizes = (int *)realloc(node->input_port_sizes, sizeof(int)*(node->num_input_port_sizes+1));
00183         node->input_port_sizes[node->num_input_port_sizes] = port_width;
00184         node->num_input_port_sizes++;
00185 }

00187 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00188  * (function: allocate_npin)
00189  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00190 npin_t* allocate_npin()
00191 {
00192         npin_t *new_pin;
00193 
00194         new_pin = (npin_t *)my_malloc_struct(sizeof(npin_t));
00195         
00196         new_pin->name = NULL;
00197         new_pin->type = -1;
00198         new_pin->net = NULL;
00199         new_pin->pin_net_idx = -1;
00200         new_pin->node = NULL;
00201         new_pin->pin_node_idx = -1;
00202 
00203         return new_pin;
00204 }
00205 
00206 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207  * (function: copy_input_npin)
00208  *      Copies an input pin and potentially adds to the net
00209  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00210 npin_t* copy_input_npin(npin_t* copy_pin)
00211 {
00212         npin_t *new_pin = allocate_npin();
00213         oassert(copy_pin->type == INPUT);
00214 
00215         new_pin->name = copy_pin->name;
00216         new_pin->type = copy_pin->type;
00217         if (copy_pin->net != NULL)
00218         {
00219                 add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(copy_pin->net, new_pin);
00220         }
00221 
00222         return new_pin;
00223 }
00224 
00225 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00226  * (function: free_npin)
00227  *      doesn't free any one else
00228  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00229 void free_npin(npin_t *to_free)
00230 {
00231         if (to_free != NULL)
00232         {
00233                 free(to_free);
00234         }
00235 }
00236 
00237 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00238  * (function: allocate_nnet)
00239  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00240 nnet_t* allocate_nnet()
00241 {
00242         nnet_t *new_net;
00243 
00244         new_net = (nnet_t*)my_malloc_struct(sizeof(nnet_t));
00245         
00246         new_net->name = NULL;
00247         new_net->driver_pin = NULL;
00248         new_net->fanout_pins = NULL;
00249         new_net->num_fanout_pins = 0;
00250         new_net->combined = FALSE;
00251 
00252         new_net->net_data = NULL;
00253         new_net->unique_net_data_id = -1;
00254 
00255         return new_net;
00256 }
00257 
00258 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00259  * (function: free_nnet)
00260  *      free nnet_t struct
00261  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00262 void free_nnet(nnet_t *to_free)
00263 {
00264         if (to_free != NULL)
00265         {
00266                 free(to_free);
00267         }
00268 }

00270 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271  * (function: add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx)
00272  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00273 void add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(nnode_t *node, npin_t *pin, int pin_idx)
00274 {
00275         oassert(node != NULL);
00276         oassert(pin != NULL);
00277         oassert(pin_idx < node->num_input_pins);
00278         /* assumes the pin spots have been allocated and the pin */
00279         node->input_pins[pin_idx] = pin;
00280         /* record the node and pin spot in the pin */
00281         pin->type = INPUT;
00282         pin->node = node;
00283         pin->pin_node_idx = pin_idx;
00284 }
00285 
00286 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287  * (function: add_a_input_pin_to_spot_idx)
00288  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00289 void add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(nnet_t *net, npin_t *pin)
00290 {
00291         oassert(net != NULL);
00292         oassert(pin != NULL);
00293         oassert(pin->type != OUTPUT);
00294         /* assumes the pin spots have been allocated and the pin */
00295         net->fanout_pins = (npin_t**)realloc(net->fanout_pins, sizeof(npin_t*)*(net->num_fanout_pins+1));
00296         net->fanout_pins[net->num_fanout_pins] = pin;
00297         net->num_fanout_pins++;
00298         /* record the node and pin spot in the pin */
00299         pin->net = net;
00300         pin->pin_net_idx = net->num_fanout_pins-1;
00301         pin->type = INPUT;
00302 }
00303 
00304 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00305  * (function: add_a_output_pin_to_node_spot_idx)
00306  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00307 void add_a_output_pin_to_node_spot_idx(nnode_t *node, npin_t *pin, int pin_idx)
00308 {
00309         oassert(node != NULL);
00310         oassert(pin != NULL);
00311         oassert(pin_idx < node->num_output_pins);
00312         /* assumes the pin spots have been allocated and the pin */
00313         node->output_pins[pin_idx] = pin;
00314         /* record the node and pin spot in the pin */
00315         pin->type = OUTPUT;
00316         pin->node = node;
00317         pin->pin_node_idx = pin_idx;
00318 }
00319 
00320 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00321  * (function: add_a_output_pin_to_spot_idx)
00322  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00323 void add_a_driver_pin_to_net(nnet_t *net, npin_t *pin)
00324 {
00325         oassert(net != NULL);
00326         oassert(pin != NULL);
00327         oassert(pin->type != INPUT);
00328         /* assumes the pin spots have been allocated and the pin */
00329         net->driver_pin = pin;
00330         /* record the node and pin spot in the pin */
00331         pin->net = net;
00332         pin->type = OUTPUT;
00333 }
00334 
00335 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00336  * (function: combine_nets)
00337  *      // output net is a net with a driver
00338  *      // input net is a net with all the fanouts
00339  *      The lasting one is input, and output disappears
00340  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00341 void combine_nets(nnet_t *output_net, nnet_t* input_net, netlist_t *netlist)
00342 {
00343         /* copy the driver over to the new_net */       
00344         if (output_net->driver_pin != NULL)
00345         {
00346                 /* IF - there is a pin assigned to this net, then copy it */
00347                 add_a_driver_pin_to_net(input_net, output_net->driver_pin);
00348         }
00349         /* in case there are any fanouts in output net (should only be zero and one nodes */
00350         join_nets(input_net, output_net);
00351         /* mark that this is combined */
00352         input_net->combined = TRUE;
00353         
00354         /* special cases for global nets */
00355         if (output_net == netlist->zero_net) 
00356         {
00357                 netlist->zero_net = input_net;
00358         }
00359         else if (output_net == netlist->one_net)
00360         {
00361                 netlist->one_net = input_net;
00362         }
00363 
00364         /* free the driver net */       
00365         free_nnet(output_net);
00366 }
00367 
00368 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00369  * (function: join_nets)
00370  *      Copies the fanouts from input net into net
00371  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00372 void join_nets(nnet_t *join_to_net, nnet_t* other_net)
00373 {
00374         int i;
00375 
00376         if (join_to_net == other_net)
00377         {
00378                 if ((join_to_net->driver_pin != NULL ) && (join_to_net->driver_pin->node != NULL) && join_to_net->driver_pin->node->related_ast_node != NULL)
00379                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, join_to_net->driver_pin->node->related_ast_node->line_number, join_to_net->driver_pin->node->related_ast_node->file_number, "This is a combinational loop\n");
00380                 else
00381                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, -1, -1, "This is a combinational loop\n");
00382                 if ((join_to_net->fanout_pins[0] != NULL ) && (join_to_net->fanout_pins[0]->node != NULL) && join_to_net->fanout_pins[0]->node->related_ast_node != NULL)
00383                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, join_to_net->fanout_pins[0]->node->related_ast_node->line_number, join_to_net->fanout_pins[0]->node->related_ast_node->file_number, "This is a combinational loop with more info\n");
00384                 else
00385                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, -1, -1, "Same error - This is a combinational loop\n");
00386         }
00387 
00388         /* copy the driver over to the new_net */       
00389         for (i = 0; i < other_net->num_fanout_pins; i++)
00390         {
00391                 if (other_net->fanout_pins[i] != NULL)
00392                 {
00393                         add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(join_to_net, other_net->fanout_pins[i]);
00394                 }
00395         }       
00396 }
00397 
00398 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00399  * (function: remap_pin_to_new_net)
00400  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00401 void remap_pin_to_new_net(npin_t *pin, nnet_t *new_net)
00402 {
00403         if (pin->type == INPUT)
00404         {
00405                 /* clean out the entry in the old net */
00406                 pin->net->fanout_pins[pin->pin_net_idx] = NULL;
00407                 /* do the new addition */
00408                 add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(new_net, pin);
00409         }
00410         else if (pin->type == OUTPUT)
00411         {
00412                 /* clean out the entry in the old net */
00413                 pin->net->driver_pin = NULL;    
00414                 /* do the new addition */
00415                 add_a_driver_pin_to_net(new_net, pin);
00416         }
00417 }
00418 
00419 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00420  * (function: remap_pin_to_new_node)
00421  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00422 void remap_pin_to_new_node(npin_t *pin, nnode_t *new_node, int pin_idx)
00423 {
00424         if (pin->type == INPUT)
00425         {
00426                 /* clean out the entry in the old net */
00427                 pin->node->input_pins[pin->pin_node_idx] = NULL;
00428                 /* do the new addition */
00429                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_node, pin, pin_idx);
00430         }
00431         else if (pin->type == OUTPUT)
00432         {
00433                 /* clean out the entry in the old net */
00434                 pin->node->output_pins[pin->pin_node_idx] = NULL;       
00435                 /* do the new addition */
00436                 add_a_output_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_node, pin, pin_idx);
00437         }
00438 }
00439 
00440 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------
00441  * (function: connect_nodes)
00442  *      Connect one output node to the inputs of the input node
00443  *----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00444 void connect_nodes(nnode_t *out_node, int out_idx, nnode_t *in_node, int in_idx)
00445 {
00446         npin_t *new_in_pin;
00447 
00448         oassert(out_node->num_output_pins > out_idx);
00449         oassert(in_node->num_input_pins > in_idx);
00450 
00451         new_in_pin = allocate_npin();
00452         
00453         /* create the pin that hooks up to the input */
00454         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(in_node, new_in_pin, in_idx);
00455         
00456         if (out_node->output_pins[out_idx] == NULL)
00457         {
00458                 /* IF - this node has no output net or pin */
00459                 npin_t *new_out_pin;
00460                 nnet_t *new_net;
00461                 new_net = allocate_nnet();
00462                 new_out_pin = allocate_npin();;
00463         
00464                 /* create the pin that hooks up to the input */
00465                 add_a_output_pin_to_node_spot_idx(out_node, new_out_pin, out_idx);
00466                 /* hook up in pin out of the new net */
00467                 add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(new_net, new_in_pin);
00468                 /* hook up the new pin 2 to this new net */
00469                 add_a_driver_pin_to_net(new_net, new_out_pin);
00470         }
00471         else
00472         {
00473                 /* ELSE - there is a net so we just add a fanout */
00474                 /* hook up in pin out of the new net */
00475                 add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(out_node->output_pins[out_idx]->net, new_in_pin);
00476         }
00477 }
00478 
00479 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00480  * (function: init_signal_list_structure)
00481  *      Initializes the list structure which describes inputs and outputs of elements
00482  *      as they coneect to other elements in the graph.
00483  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00484 signal_list_t *init_signal_list_structure()
00485 {
00486         signal_list_t *list;
00487         list = (signal_list_t*)malloc(sizeof(signal_list_t));
00488 
00489         list->signal_list_size = 0;
00490         list->signal_list = NULL;
00491         list->is_memory = FALSE;
00492 
00493         return list;
00494 }
00495 
00496 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00497  * (function: add_inpin_to_signal_list)
00498  *      Stores a pin in the signal list
00499  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00500 void add_pin_to_signal_list(signal_list_t *list, npin_t* pin)
00501 {
00502         list->signal_list = (npin_t**)realloc(list->signal_list, sizeof(npin_t*)*(list->signal_list_size+1));
00503         list->signal_list[list->signal_list_size] = pin;
00504         list->signal_list_size++;
00505 }
00506 
00507 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00508  * (function: combine_lists)
00509  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00510 signal_list_t *combine_lists(signal_list_t **signal_lists, int num_signal_lists)
00511 {
00512         int i, j;
00513         
00514         for (i = 1; i < num_signal_lists; i++)
00515         {
00516                 for (j = 0; j < signal_lists[i]->signal_list_size; j++)
00517                 {
00518                         add_pin_to_signal_list(signal_lists[0], signal_lists[i]->signal_list[j]);
00519                 }
00520                 clean_signal_list_structure(signal_lists[i]);
00521         }
00522 
00523         return signal_lists[0];
00524 }
00525 
00526 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00527  * (function: combine_lists_without_freeing_originals)
00528  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00529 signal_list_t *combine_lists_without_freeing_originals(signal_list_t **signal_lists, int num_signal_lists)
00530 {
00531         int i, j;
00532         signal_list_t *return_list = init_signal_list_structure();
00533         
00534         for (i = 0; i < num_signal_lists; i++)
00535         {
00536                 for (j = 0; j < signal_lists[i]->signal_list_size; j++)
00537                 {
00538                         add_pin_to_signal_list(return_list, signal_lists[i]->signal_list[j]);
00539                 }
00540         }
00541 
00542         return return_list;
00543 }
00544 
00545 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00546  * (function: sort_signal_list_alphabetically)
00547  *      Bubble sort alphabetically
00548  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00549 void sort_signal_list_alphabetically(signal_list_t *list)
00550 {
00551         int i, j;
00552         npin_t *tmp_pin;        
00553 
00554         for (i = 0; i < list->signal_list_size-1; i++)
00555         {
00556                 for (j = 0; j< (list->signal_list_size-1-i); j++) 
00557                 {
00558                         /* compare the neighbours */
00559                         if (strcmp(list->signal_list[j+1]->name, list->signal_list[j]->name) < 0 ) 
00560                         {
00561                                 tmp_pin = list->signal_list[j];
00562                                 list->signal_list[j] = list->signal_list[j+1]; 
00563                                 list->signal_list[j+1] = tmp_pin;
00564                         }
00565                 }
00566         }
00567 }
00568 
00569 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00570  * (function: make_output_pins_for_existing_node)
00571  *      Looks at a node and extracts the output pins into a signal list so they can be accessed
00572  *      in this form
00573  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00574 signal_list_t *make_output_pins_for_existing_node(nnode_t* node, int width)
00575 {
00576         signal_list_t *return_list = init_signal_list_structure();
00577         int i; 
00578 
00579         oassert(node->num_output_pins == width);
00580 
00581         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00582         {
00583                 npin_t *new_pin1;
00584                 npin_t *new_pin2;
00585                 nnet_t *new_net;
00586                 new_pin1 = allocate_npin();
00587                 new_pin2 = allocate_npin();
00588                 new_net = allocate_nnet();
00589                 new_net->name = node->name;
00590                 /* hook the output pin into the node */
00591                 add_a_output_pin_to_node_spot_idx(node, new_pin1, i);
00592                 /* hook up new pin 1 into the new net */
00593                 add_a_driver_pin_to_net(new_net, new_pin1);
00594                 /* hook up the new pin 2 to this new net */
00595                 add_a_fanout_pin_to_net(new_net, new_pin2);
00596                 
00597                 /* add the new_pin2 to the list of pins */
00598                 add_pin_to_signal_list(return_list, new_pin2);
00599         }
00600 
00601         return return_list;
00602 }
00603 
00604 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00605  * (function: clean_signal_list_structure)
00606  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00607 void clean_signal_list_structure(signal_list_t *list)
00608 {
00609         if (list->signal_list != NULL)
00610                 free(list->signal_list);
00611         list->signal_list_size = 0;
00612 
00613         free(list);
00614 }
00615 
00616 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00617  * (function: hookup_input_pins_from_signal_list)
00618  *      For each pin in this list hook it up to the inputs according to indexes and width
00619  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00620 void hookup_input_pins_from_signal_list(nnode_t *node, int n_start_idx, signal_list_t* input_list, int il_start_idx, int width, netlist_t *netlist) 
00621 {
00622         int i;
00623 
00624         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00625         {
00626                 if (il_start_idx+i < input_list->signal_list_size)
00627                 {
00628                         oassert(input_list->signal_list_size > (il_start_idx+i));
00629                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(node, input_list->signal_list[il_start_idx+i], n_start_idx+i);
00630                 }
00631                 else
00632                 {
00633                         /* pad with 0's */
00634                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(node, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), n_start_idx+i);
00635                         warning_message(NETLIST_ERROR, -1, -1, "padding an input port with 0 for node %s\n", node->name);
00636                 }
00637         }       
00638 }
00639 
00640 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00641  * (function: hookup_output_pouts_from_signal_list)
00642  *      hooks the pin into the output net, by checking for a driving net
00643  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00644 void hookup_output_pins_from_signal_list(nnode_t *node, int n_start_idx, signal_list_t* output_list, int ol_start_idx, int width) 
00645 {
00646         int i;
00647         long sc_spot_output;
00648 
00649         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00650         {
00651                 oassert(output_list->signal_list_size > (ol_start_idx+i));
00652         
00653                 /* hook outpin to the node */
00654                 add_a_output_pin_to_node_spot_idx(node, output_list->signal_list[ol_start_idx+i], n_start_idx+i);
00655 
00656                 if ((sc_spot_output = sc_lookup_string(output_nets_sc, output_list->signal_list[ol_start_idx+i]->name)) == -1)
00657                 {
00658                         /* this output pin does not have a net OR we couldn't find it */
00659                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, -1, -1, "Net for driver (%s) doesn't exist for node %s\n", output_list->signal_list[ol_start_idx+i]->name, node->name);
00660                 }
00661         
00662                 /* hook the outpin into the net */
00663                 add_a_driver_pin_to_net(((nnet_t*)output_nets_sc->data[sc_spot_output]), output_list->signal_list[ol_start_idx+i]);
00664         }       
00665 }
00666 
00667 void depth_traverse_count(nnode_t *node, int *count, int traverse_mark_number);
00668 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00669  * (function: count_nodes_in_netlist)
00670  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00671 int count_nodes_in_netlist(netlist_t *netlist)
00672 {
00673         int i;
00674         int count = 0;
00675 
00676         /* now traverse the ground and vcc pins */
00677         depth_traverse_count(netlist->gnd_node, &count,  COUNT_NODES);
00678         depth_traverse_count(netlist->vcc_node, &count, COUNT_NODES);
00679 
00680         /* start with the primary input list */
00681         for (i = 0; i < netlist->num_top_input_nodes; i++)
00682         {
00683                 if (netlist->top_input_nodes[i] != NULL)
00684                 {
00685                         depth_traverse_count(netlist->top_input_nodes[i], &count,  COUNT_NODES);
00686                 }
00687         }
00688 
00689         return count;
00690 }
00691 
00692 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00693  * (function: depth_first_traverse)
00694  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00695 void depth_traverse_count(nnode_t *node, int *count, int traverse_mark_number)
00696 {
00697         int i, j;
00698         nnode_t *next_node;
00699         nnet_t *next_net;
00700 
00701         if (node->traverse_visited == traverse_mark_number)
00702         {
00703                 return;
00704         }
00705         else
00706         {
00707                 /* ELSE - this is a new node so depth visit it */
00708                 (*count) ++;
00709 
00710                 /* mark that we have visitied this node now */
00711                 node->traverse_visited = traverse_mark_number;
00712 
00713                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_output_pins; i++)
00714                 {
00715                         if (node->output_pins[i]->net == NULL)
00716                                 continue;
00717 
00718                         next_net = node->output_pins[i]->net;
00719                         for (j = 0; j < next_net->num_fanout_pins; j++)
00720                         {
00721                                 if (next_net->fanout_pins[j] == NULL)
00722                                         continue;
00723                                 next_node = next_net->fanout_pins[j]->node;
00724                                 if (next_node == NULL)
00725                                         continue;
00726 
00727                                 /* recursive call point */
00728                                 depth_traverse_count(next_node, count, traverse_mark_number);
00729                         }
00730                 }
00731         }
00732 }
00733 
00734 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00735  * (function:  allocate_netlist)
00736  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00737 netlist_t* allocate_netlist()
00738 {
00739         netlist_t *new_netlist;
00740 
00741         new_netlist = (netlist_t *)my_malloc_struct(sizeof(netlist_t));
00742 
00743         new_netlist->gnd_node = NULL;
00744         new_netlist->vcc_node = NULL;
00745         new_netlist->zero_net = NULL;
00746         new_netlist->one_net = NULL;
00747         new_netlist->top_input_nodes = NULL;
00748         new_netlist->num_top_input_nodes = 0;
00749         new_netlist->top_output_nodes = NULL;
00750         new_netlist->num_top_output_nodes = 0;
00751         new_netlist->ff_nodes = NULL;
00752         new_netlist->num_ff_nodes = 0;
00753         new_netlist->internal_nodes = NULL;
00754         new_netlist->num_internal_nodes = 0;
00755         new_netlist->clocks = NULL;
00756         new_netlist->num_clocks = 0;
00757 
00758         new_netlist->forward_levels = NULL;
00759         new_netlist->num_forward_levels = 0;
00760         new_netlist->num_at_forward_level = NULL;
00761         new_netlist->backward_levels = NULL; 
00762         new_netlist->num_backward_levels = 0;
00763         new_netlist->num_at_backward_level = NULL;
00764         new_netlist->sequential_level_nodes = NULL; 
00765         new_netlist->num_sequential_levels = 0;
00766         new_netlist->num_at_sequential_level = NULL;
00767         new_netlist->sequential_level_combinational_termination_node = NULL;
00768         new_netlist->num_sequential_level_combinational_termination_nodes = 0;
00769         new_netlist->num_at_sequential_level_combinational_termination_node = NULL;
00770 
00771         /* initialize the string chaches */
00772         new_netlist->nets_sc = sc_new_string_cache();
00773         new_netlist->out_pins_sc = sc_new_string_cache();
00774         new_netlist->nodes_sc = sc_new_string_cache();
00775 
00776         new_netlist->stats = NULL;
00777 
00778         return new_netlist;
00779 }

00781 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00782  * (function:  free_netlist)
00783  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00784 void free_netlist(netlist_t *to_free)
00785 {
00786         sc_free_string_cache(to_free->nets_sc);
00787         sc_free_string_cache(to_free->out_pins_sc);
00788         sc_free_string_cache(to_free->nodes_sc);
00789 }
00790 
00791 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00792  * (function:  add_node_to_netlist)
00793  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00794 void add_node_to_netlist(netlist_t *netlist, nnode_t *node, short special_node)
00795 {
00796         long sc_spot;
00797 
00798 //      if (node->type != OUTPUT_NODE)
00799         {
00800                 /* add the node to the list */
00801                 sc_spot = sc_add_string(netlist->nodes_sc, node->name);
00802                 if (netlist->nodes_sc->data[sc_spot] != NULL)
00803                 {
00804                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, linenum, -1, "Two nodes with the same name (%s)\n", node->name);
00805                 }
00806                 netlist->nodes_sc->data[sc_spot] = (void*)node;
00807         }
00808                 
00809         if (special_node == INPUT_NODE)
00810         {
00811                 /* This is for clocks, gnd, and vcc */
00812                 /* store the input nodes for traversal */
00813                 netlist->top_input_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(netlist->top_input_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(netlist->num_top_input_nodes+1));
00814                 netlist->top_input_nodes[netlist->num_top_input_nodes] = node;
00815                 netlist->num_top_input_nodes++;
00816         }
00817         else if (node->type == INPUT_NODE)
00818         {
00819                 /* store the input nodes for traversal */
00820                 netlist->top_input_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(netlist->top_input_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(netlist->num_top_input_nodes+1));
00821                 netlist->top_input_nodes[netlist->num_top_input_nodes] = node;
00822                 netlist->num_top_input_nodes++;
00823         }
00824         else if (node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00825         {
00826                 netlist->top_output_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(netlist->top_output_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(netlist->num_top_output_nodes+1));
00827                 netlist->top_output_nodes[netlist->num_top_output_nodes] = node;
00828                 netlist->num_top_output_nodes++;
00829         }
00830         else if (node->type == FF_NODE)
00831         {
00832                 netlist->ff_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(netlist->ff_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(netlist->num_ff_nodes+1));
00833                 netlist->ff_nodes[netlist->num_ff_nodes] = node;
00834                 netlist->num_ff_nodes++;
00835         }
00836         else 
00837         {
00838                 netlist->internal_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(netlist->internal_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(netlist->num_internal_nodes+1));
00839                 netlist->internal_nodes[netlist->num_internal_nodes] = node;
00840                 netlist->num_internal_nodes++;
00841         }
00842 }
00843 
00844 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00845  * (function: mark_clock_node )
00846  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00847 void
00848 mark_clock_node (
00849         netlist_t *netlist,
00850         char *clock_name
00851 )
00852 {
00853         long sc_spot;
00854         nnet_t *clock_net;
00855         nnode_t *clock_node;
00856 
00857         /* lookup the node */
00858         if ((sc_spot = sc_lookup_string(netlist->nets_sc, clock_name)) == -1)
00859         {
00860                 error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, linenum, -1, "clock input does not exist (%s)\n", clock_name);
00861         }
00862         clock_net = (nnet_t*)netlist->nets_sc->data[sc_spot];
00863         clock_node = clock_net->driver_pin->node;
00864 
00865         netlist->clocks = (nnode_t**)realloc(netlist->clocks, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(netlist->num_clocks+1));
00866         netlist->clocks[netlist->num_clocks] = clock_node;
00867         netlist->num_clocks++;
00868 
00869         /* Mark it as a special set of inputs */
00870         clock_node->type = CLOCK_NODE;
00871 }
